channel.title: How to render more map area like in html?
channel.description: earlier i watched a video about html in rs and thought it was neat how players could see stuff so far away like the map loads/renders more area and i went on by looking though my client files to see what controlled the map loading amount and im pretty sure it goes through regions right? idk but i thought maybe theres something i could change to make it show more area. im using a pi does anyone have any information that could help me? also i think this would be a good topic for everyone to talk about.

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

hadlich4:

yall think there will be any html private servers anytime soon?

Not till at least 1 month after RS3 is released to to general public.

Read full topic

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

they’re still using java, and will continue to improve it’s quality.

the only real reason of moving towards html5 is the same reason they chose java in the first place; portability.

Read full topic
item.source: How to render more map area like in html?

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:9, topic:520342”]Of course you can increase the draw distance with Java… Look into where it unpacks the regions and adds them to the scene graph.

Hence the reason why runescape isn’t using it anymore.
I’m sure they saw too many drawbacks.
They looked at html5 and all those engines, saw how amazing they can be, and figured it’d be better.

Runescape still is using Java for one of their clients (and always will).[/quote]
They’re moving to HTML5 and other code, the standalone client isn’t going to look anything like the web client.

Read full topic
item.source: How to render more map area like in html?

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Of course you can increase the draw distance with Java… Look into where it unpacks the regions and adds them to the scene graph.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:520342”]Hence the reason why runescape isn’t using it anymore.
I’m sure they saw too many drawbacks.
They looked at html5 and all those engines, saw how amazing they can be, and figured it’d be better.[/quote]
Runescape still is using Java for one of their clients (and always will).

Read full topic

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:520342”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=638841.msg4306329#msg4306329 date=1369882665]
yes thats exactly what i mean i just didnt know the word for it i knew it was rendering or something, but yes how to increase draw distance
[/quote]
I don’t think you can with Java.[/quote]

Hence the reason why runescape isn’t using it anymore.
I’m sure they saw too many drawbacks.
They looked at html5 and all those engines, saw how amazing they can be, and figured it’d be better.

item.source: How to render more map area like in html?

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:4, topic:520342”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638841.msg4306215#msg4306215 date=1369869357]
Why do you want to accomplish this?
[/quote]

because when players go into full screen mode you see the map but i feel like the player should be able to see more ya know.

First off, the server you’re using has nothing to do with it. For the mini map, if you’re able to do this, you’d have to mess with the mini map X and Y lengths to make the mini map bigger/smaller. As for the map rendering, I have no idea because I haven’t messed with it before.

well i dont really care for changing the minimap just wanting to make the map render a bigger portion of the map if you know what i mean thanks for trying to help with minimap though[/quote]
Do you mean the draw distance that you see?

Read full topic
item.source: How to render more map area like in html?

item.title: How to render more map area like in html?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Why do you want to accomplish this?

because when players go into full screen mode you see the map but i feel like the player should be able to see more ya know.

3lv3n snip3r:

First off, the server you’re using has nothing to do with it. For the mini map, if you’re able to do this, you’d have to mess with the mini map X and Y lengths to make the mini map bigger/smaller. As for the map rendering, I have no idea because I haven’t messed with it before.

well i dont really care for changing the minimap just wanting to make the map render a bigger portion of the map if you know what i mean thanks for trying to help with minimap though

Read full topic
